description:
Jimbei and Shirahoshi are captured by the enemy, and Hordy makes a shocking revelation to the population of Fish-Man Island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Surprising Confession! The Truth Behind the Assassination of Otohime!
Shougeki no Kokuhaku: Otohime Ansatsu no Shinjitsu
Une révélation tonitruante. La vérité sur l`assassinat d`Otohime
Шокирующее признание! Правда об убийстве Отохиме!
اعتراف صادم! الحقيقة خلف اغتيال أوتوهيمي
衝撃の告白 オトヒメ暗殺の真実
